name: Heart Seeker VR
description:
Only for Oculus Quest.

Play the classic game of revealing where it is not mine. Look at the numbers and do not open the box that contains a mine. Simple, easy and addictive. Various difficulty levels. Select Mines or Hearts. Get your highest score.

You can download the .apk file, which you will have to install in your oculus quest. You should have knowledge of SideQuest.
